findings.title: _transfer function includes invalid token transfer for Team address
findings.description: In the _transfer function, tokens being transferred to the team address are the same as the tokens being transferred to the recipient address. The team address receives the token amount stored in _toAmount local variable instead of teamAmount.

findings.title: Multiplication is being performed on the result of Division
findings.description: Integer divisions in Solidity might be truncated and performing division before multiplication might lead to loss of precision.

findings.title: Costly Loops found in the Protocol
findings.description: The Stray contract has some for loops in the contract that include state variables like .length of a non-memory array, in the condition of the for loops. As a result, these state variables consume a lot more extra gas for every iteration of the for loop.
